title: Priya
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A vegan restaurant offering smoothies, soups and salads. They produce their own almond milk, and there is no added sugar in the smoothies. They also have a variety super foods for smoothies: gogi berries cocoa beans, spirulina, chlorella, chia seeds and acai.
